title: Provided that where the Commissioner with special written permission, decides that the buildable existing amenity is no longer required in view of the available amenity in the vicinity, then the amenity shall be developed for other public purpose considering the deficiency in the administrative ward
clause_text: Provided that where the Commissioner with special written permission, decides that the buildable existing amenity is no longer required in view of the available amenity in the vicinity, then the amenity shall be developed for other public purpose considering the deficiency in the administrative ward.
section: Development of the existing amenity/reservation/partly existing amenity/partly reserved/amenity Plot:
